text: However, it's crucial to recognize that the Fat Acceptance Movement can coexist with promoting healthy habits and overall well-being. By fostering a supportive and non-judgmental environment, individuals are more likely to feel empowered to make positive changes for their health without the fear of stigma or shame. Embracing body diversity and promoting self-acceptance can actually encourage people to prioritize their health from a place of self-love rather than self.
